imgDesc.text: The odd gems called Scarlet Quartzes contain a certain kind of warming energy. <color=#ffe14b>Break them and collect their fragments</color> to engulf your character in that energy.

Under its influence, <color=#ffe14b>you will stop accumulating Sheer Cold</color> . You can use this effect to keep warm for an extended period. Attack and opponent before its duration ends to release all the accumulated energy at once.
For some reason, however, warping from here to a Teleport Waypoint or a Statue of The Seven will cause <color=#ffe14b>the power of these</color> <color=#ffe14b>Scarlet Quartzes to dissipate</color> ...
